name: Wayne Gretzky
quote: You miss one hundred percent of the shots you don't take.
When you win, say nothing, when you lose say less
I skate to where the puck is going to be, not where it has been

name: Charles Swindoll
quote: Anything under God's control is never out of control
Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it
We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.

name: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth
It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see
To affect the quality of the day, that is the highest of arts.

name: George Addair
quote: Everything you ever wanted is on the other side of fear
It is such a mysterious place, the land of tears
It is so much easier to be enthusiastic than to reason
